overview:
Andy Chen is a director at Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers. His primary focus is on their engineering recruiting strategy across their digital portfolio.

Prior to joining Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, Andy was a science, technology and weapons analyst at the Central Intelligence Agency, where he provided intelligence to senior US policymakers, including: the President of the United States, the Office of the Vice President, and the National Security Council. Prior to the CIA, Andy was a Manager at Riviera Partners, where he helped form and build the contingency engineering recruiting practice.

He is a graduate of the University of California at San Diego and holds a BS and MS degree in Mechanical Engineering and Applied Plasma Physics.
